content: @WG-triage meeting time
will wait for 2 more mins
ok no worries, let's start :slight_smile:
i'll send calendar invites in advance from the next meeting onwards ( will be held first wed of the month at 16.00 UTC (same time as today))
so we don't have much to discuss today: this is the agenda which covers things we didn't discuss at last month's meeting: https://hackmd.io/DZ2q4BlpRkSyf4RUxtil9g

i'll jump first to:

  • Fixing the feedback form
I think it could be more general like “PRs not upated in the amount of days according to the guidelines” so we have only one place to keep up to date

since the team updates their reports now here, I generally don't check the form that frequently (or at all) and I think that's fine for now (don't think anyone checks it and most of the details are covered by the reports)
so if you have concerns regarding prs you have skipped or so, you can dump them in the reports as well (Which some of you are already doing)
sure~
Alright
feel free to throw in as much info as you want in the reports, it makes it easier to understand
especially if you have skipped any prs, because you may have skipped them by mistake makes it easier for me to crosscheck

so moving on:

  • Has anyone been triaging issues? Any guidance on this?
(i should have noted who added this point :stuck_out_tongue: )
so any of you have any feedback with respect to triaging issues?
Wasnt this discussed last meeting? Ill check
i think we did. But if there's anything to be added

also on that note:

  • Descriptions for every label
i think we may have discussed this, but there is a description on the labels page
Yeah most labels do have one, which is nice.
https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/labels
i think forge might have something as well, I haven't checked
but if you find any description that you wish can be updated or any label that's missing some documentation, and if you have don't access to change it, you can let me know
i hink we discussed the rest of the agenda last time
one important point : if you are closing a pr due to inactivity and you see a "relnotes" label attached to it, kindly remove the label as well
I’ll note this for when I make the forge PR
and if you find any prs that are linked to P-critical / p-high or nominated issues, mention it in the reports. The label is on the issue though not on the pr
Would be great if y'all could look out for PRs that qualify for relnotes-perf too, I tend to forget about that
I normally do a scan during release week, but forgot to do it last time
i think that's it from me, anyone has any feedback to add?
the meetings in future are more likely to be like this, short 30 mins :grinning:
(or 15-20 mins )
Seems good :)
also uhm, in case you missed it in the thread discussion - there's a change in schedule just for this month

DPC said:

yep. Owen takes thursdays and Elinvynia takes saturday till end of July
i'm not that too concerned about the schedule, as long as the work gets shared. So for the next meeting we can discuss whether we want to stick to the original one or continue with the july schedule
i think that's it for this meeting then. :slight_smile: thanks for attending
thanks~
the next meeting will be on 05.08.2020 at the same time (16.00 UTC). I'll send calendar invites that repeat and share the agenda in advance if you wish to add anything to it
thanks and have a safe July ahead :slight_smile:
for those who missed the meeting and want to share anything, you can put it here, i'll discuss it in next month's meeting or async-ly
